Stop the building of Hinkley "C" power station!

At a time when world leaders in Nuclear Power such as France are pulling out, they are quite happy to exploit us and put it in "our back yard".

Just consider the recent disasters in Russia, Japan and the United States where previously they had almost unblemished safety records.

Of course we need carbon-neutral sources of energy which are sustainable, but Nuclear is a short-term solution to buy us time for the one-off bonus of fossil fuel we have wasted. It took 96 million years of dead dinosaurs carcases to produce it and we've wasted it in just a few generations.
